name: Noodle Bridges
description:
This game was made for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 156.

The theme was "Noodle".

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

In this game you have the power to create noodle-bridges, in which you can walk.

Your objective is to take a bowl of ramen and bring it to a table.

You can create a limited number of noodle-bridges per level so think carefully.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls: 

"a" or "left arrow" to move left.

"d" or "right arrow" to move right.

"space" to jump.

"left mouse" to create a noodle-bridge.
